3034    private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromNonParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3035                                                                           final boolean lowerBounded,
3036                                                                           final Type<Y> payloadNonParameterizedType) {
3037      if (payloadNonParameterizedType.componentType() == null) {
3038        if (payloadNonParameterizedType.lowerBounded()) {
3039          return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType, true);
3040        } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.upperBounded()) {
3041          if (payloadNonParameterizedType.named()) {
3042            return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
3043          } else {
3044            return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType, false);
3045          }
3046        } else {
3047          return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
3048        }
3049      } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.type() == payloadNonParameterizedType) {
3050        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
3051      } else {
3052        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
3053      }
3054    }

3115     * parameterized type} and not any other type, and if and only if
3116     * {@code receiverWildcardType} models a {@linkplain
3117     * java.lang.reflect.WildcardType wildcard type} and not any other
3118     * type.
3119     *
3120     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3121     * method.</p>
3122     *
3123     * <p>This implementation returns {@code false} in all cases.
3124     *
3125     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3126     * receiverWildcardType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3127     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3128     *
3129     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3130     * payloadParameterizedType}; often a {@link
3131     * java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
3132     *
3133     * @param receiverWildcardType the receiver type as described
3134     * above; must not be {@code null}
3135     *
3136     * @param lowerBounded whether {@code receiverWildcardType} is a
3137     * lower-bounded wildcard type
3138     *
3139     * @param payloadParameterizedType the payload type as described
3140     * above; must not be {@code null}
3141     *
3142     * @return {@code false} in all cases
3143     *
3144     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3145     * idempotent and deterministic.
3146     *
3147     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3148     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3149     *
3150     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3151     */
3152    @OverridingEncouraged
3153    protected <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3154                                                                           final boolean lowerBounded,
3155                                                                           final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3156      return false;
3157    }

3161     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is

3197     * idempotent and deterministic.

3200     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3201     *
3202     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)

3206                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
3207                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {

3319  /**
3320   * An abstract partial {@link Semantics} that permits subtyping.
3321   *
3322   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3323   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3324   */
3325  @Experimental
3326  public static abstract class VariantSemantics extends Semantics {
3327
3328
3329    /*
3330     * Constructors.
3331     */
3332
3333
3334    /**
3335     * Creates a new {@link VariantSemantics}.
3336     */
3337    protected VariantSemantics() {
3338      super();
3339    }
3340
3341
3342    /*
3343     * Instance methods.
3344     */
3345
3346
3347    /**
3348     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
3349     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadClass} is assignable
3350     * to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied {@code
3351     * receiverClass}, according to the assignability rules modeled by
3352     * this {@link Semantics} instance, and if and only if {@code
3353     * payloadClass} models a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not
3354     * any other type, and if and only if {@code receiverClass} models
3355     * a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not any other type.
3356     *
3357     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3358     * method.</p>
3359     *
3360     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if
3361     * {@link Type#supertypeOf(Type)
3362     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}.
3363     *
3364     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3365     * receiverClass}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3366     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3367     *
3368     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
3369     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
3370     *
3371     * @param receiverClass the receiver type as described above; must
3372     * not be {@code null}
3373     *
3374     * @param payloadClass the payload type as described above; must
3375     * not be {@code null}
3376     *
3377     * @return {@code true} if and only if {@link
3378     * Type#supertypeOf(Type) receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass)}
3379     * returns {@code true}
3380     *
3381     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3382     * idempotent and deterministic.
3383     *
3384     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3385     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3386     *
3387     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3388     */
3389    @Override
3390    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3391      return receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass);
3392    }
3393
3394    /**
3395     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
3396     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is
3397     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
3398     * supplied {@code receiverGenericArrayType}, according to the
3399     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
3400     * and if and only if {@code payloadGenericArrayType} models a
3401     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array
3402     * type} and not any other type, and if and only if {@code
3403     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
3404     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
3405     * any other type.
3406     *
3407     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3408     * method.</p>
3409     *
3410     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if the
3411     * {@linkplain Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
3412     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
3413     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
3414     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}.</p>
3415     *
3416     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3417     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3418     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3419     *
3420     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
3421     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
3422     *
3423     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
3424     * above; must not be {@code null}
3425     *
3426     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
3427     * above; must not be {@code null}
3428     *
3429     * @return {@code true} if and only if the {@linkplain
3430     * Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
3431     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
3432     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
3433     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}
3434     *
3435     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3436     * idempotent and deterministic.
3437     *
3438     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3439     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3440     *
3441     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3442     */
3443    @Override
3444    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3445                                                                                    final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3446      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
3447    }
3448
3449    final <X> List<? extends Type<X>> condense(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds) {
3450      if (!bounds.isEmpty()) {
3451        final Type<X> firstBound = bounds.get(0);
3452        if (firstBound.named() && firstBound.upperBounded()) {
3453          // it's a type variable
3454          return this.condense(firstBound.upperBounds());
3455        }
3456      }
3457      return bounds;
3458    }
3459
3460  }
3461
3462
3463  /**
3464   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements Java
3465   * type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
3466   *
3467   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3468   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3469   */
3470  @Experimental
3471  public static class CovariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3472
3473
3474    /*
3475     * Static fields.
3476     */
3477
3478
3479    /**
3480     * A convenient instance of {@link CovariantSemantics}.
3481     *
3482     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3483     */
3484    public static final CovariantSemantics INSTANCE = new CovariantSemantics();
3485
3486
3487    /*
3488     * Constructors.
3489     */
3490
3491
3492    /**
3493     * Creates a new {@link CovariantSemantics}.
3494     */
3495    public CovariantSemantics() {
3496      super();
3497    }
3498
3499
3500    /*
3501     * Instance methods.
3502     */
3503
3504
3505    @Override
3506    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3507      return this.assignable(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type());
3508    }
3509
3510    @Override
3511    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3512      final Type<X> receiverComponentType = receiverClass.componentType();
3513      return
3514        this.assignable(receiverComponentType == null ? receiverClass : receiverComponentType,
3515                        payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
3516    }
3517
3518    @Override
3519    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
3520      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadType.upperBounds()) {
3521        if (this.assignable(receiverType, bound)) {
3522          return true;
3523        }
3524      }
3525      return false;
3526    }
3527
3528    @Override
3529    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3530      // Raw types are assignable and either the payload is a generic
3531      // class (and therefore a raw class) or the payload is a class
3532      // whose parameterized supertypes need to be evaluated.
3533      return
3534        this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass) &&
3535        (payloadClass.hasTypeParameters() ||
3536         this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadClass.supertypes()));
3537    }
3538
3539    @Override
3540    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3541                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3542      return this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadParameterizedType.supertypes());
3543    }
3544
3545    private final boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(final Type<?> receiverParameterizedType,
3546                                                                   final Iterable<? extends Type<?>> payloadTypes) {
3547      for (final Type<?> payloadType : payloadTypes) {
3548        if (payloadType.hasTypeArguments() &&
3549            this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(receiverParameterizedType, payloadType)) {
3550          return true;
3551        }
3552      }
3553      return false;
3554    }
3555
3556    private final boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(final Type<?> receiverParameterizedType,
3557                                                                              final Type<?> payloadParameterizedType) {
3558      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3559        final List<? extends Type<?>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3560        final List<? extends Type<?>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3561        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
3562          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
3563            final Type<?> receiverTypeTypeArgument = receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
3564            final Type<?> payloadTypeTypeArgument = payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
3565            if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.wildcard() || payloadTypeTypeArgument.wildcard()) {
3566              if (!this.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
3567                return false;
3568              }
3569            } else if (!Type.equals(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
3570              return false;
3571            }
3572          }
3573          return true;
3574        }
3575      }
3576      return false;
3577    }
3578
3579    @Override
3580    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3581                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3582      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds()) {
3583        if (this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType, bound)) {
3584          return true;
3585        }
3586      }
3587      return false;
3588    }
3589
3590    @Override
3591    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3592                                                                         final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3593      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadClass.componentType());
3594    }
3595
3596
3597    @Override
3598    protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
3599                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3600      return receiverTypeVariable.supertypeOf(payloadTypeVariable);
3601    }
3602
3603    @Override
3604    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3605                                                                     final boolean lowerBounded,
3606                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3607      return
3608        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadClass) &&
3609        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadClass, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3610    }
3611
3612    @Override
3613    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3614                                                                                 final boolean lowerBounded,
3615                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3616      return
3617        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadParameterizedType) &&
3618        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadParameterizedType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3619    }
3620
3621    @Override
3622    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3623                                                                                final boolean lowerBounded,
3624                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3625      return
3626        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadGenericArrayType) &&
3627        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadGenericArrayType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3628    }
3629
3630    @Override
3631    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3632                                                                            final boolean lowerBounded,
3633                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3634      return
3635        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadTypeVariable) &&
3636        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadTypeVariable, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3637    }
3638
3639    @Override
3640    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3641                                                                            final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
3642                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
3643                                                                            final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
3644      final Type<X> receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound = receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0);
3645      if (this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0))) {
3646        if (receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
3647          return
3648            payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded &&
3649            this.assignable(payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0), receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
3650        }
3651        return
3652          !payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded ||
3653          this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
3654      }
3655      return false;
3656    }
3657
3658
3659  }
3660
3661  /**
3662   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that does not permit
3663   * subtyping, but that compares wildcard types covariantly.
3664   *
3665   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3666   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3667   */
3668  @Experimental
3669  public static class InvariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3670
3671
3672    /*
3673     * Static fields.
3674     */
3675
3676
3677    /**
3678     * An instance of {@link InvariantSemantics}.
3679     *
3680     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3681     */
3682    public static final InvariantSemantics INSTANCE = new InvariantSemantics();
3683
3684
3685    /*
3686     * Constructors.
3687     */
3688
3689
3690    /**
3691     * Creates a new {@link InvariantSemantics}.
3692     */
3693    public InvariantSemantics() {
3694      super();
3695    }
3696
3697
3698    /*
3699     * Instance methods.
3700     */
3701
3702
3703    @Override // VariantSemantics
3704    public <X, Y> boolean assignable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
3705      if (receiverType.wildcard() || payloadType.wildcard()) {
3706        return CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverType, payloadType);
3707      }
3708      return Type.equals(receiverType, payloadType);
3709    }
3710
3711  }
3712
3713  /**
3714   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements the
3715   * rules of <a
3716   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
3717   * target="_parent"><em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.
3718   *
3719   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3720   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3721   */
3722  @Experimental
3723  public static class CdiSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3724
3725
3726    /*
3727     * Static fields.
3728     */
3729
3730
3731    /**
3732     * An instance of {@link CdiSemantics}.
3733     *
3734     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3735     */
3736    public static final CdiSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiSemantics();
3737
3738
3739    /*
3740     * Constructors.
3741     */
3742
3743
3744    /**
3745     * Creates a new {@link CdiSemantics}.
3746     */
3747    public CdiSemantics() {
3748      super();
3749    }
3750
3751
3752    /*
3753     * Instance methods.
3754     */
3755
3756
3757    /**
3758     * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
3759     * represents an <em>actual type</em>, which the <a
3760     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#assignable_parameters"
3761     * target="_parent">CDI specification</a> implies, but does not
3762     * explicitly state, is either a class, a parameterized type or a
3763     * generic array type.
3764     *
3765     * <p>Actual types, though not defined, are <a
3766     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
3767     * target="_parent">critically important to CDI's concept of
3768     * <em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.</p>
3769     *
3770     * <p>The concept of an actual type is not mentioned in the <a
3771     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se17/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.1"
3772     * target="_parent">Java Language Specification</a>.
3773     *
3774     * @param type the {@link Type} in question; must not be {@code
3775     * null}
3776     *
3777     * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
3778     * returns {@code false} from invocations of both its {@link
3779     * #upperBounded()} and {@link #lowerBounded()} methods; {@code
3780     * false} otherwise
3781     *
3782     * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
3783     *
3784     * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
3785     *
3786     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by
3787     * multiple threads.
3788     */
3789    public final boolean actualType(final Type<?> type) {
3790      return !type.upperBounded() && !type.lowerBounded();
3791    }
3792
3793    @Convenience
3794    @Override
3795    public final boolean assignable(final java.lang.reflect.Type receiverType,
3796                                    final java.lang.reflect.Type payloadType,
3797                                    final boolean ignoredBox) {
3798      // Boxing is always required in CDI.
3799      return this.assignable(JavaType.of(true, receiverType), JavaType.of(true, payloadType));
3800    }
3801
3802    @Override
3803    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3804                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3805      if (Type.equals(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3806        for (final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument : payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3807          if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3808            // OK; it's Object.class or similar
3809          } else if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3810            final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds = payloadTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3811            switch (bounds.size()) {
3812            case 0:
3813              // OK; it's effectively "extends Object"
3814              break;
3815            case 1:
3816              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3817                return false;
3818              }
3819              break;
3820            default:
3821              return false;
3822            }
3823          } else {
3824            return false;
3825          }
3826        }
3827        return true;
3828      }
3829      return false;
3830    }
3831
3832    @Override
3833    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3834                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3835      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass)) {
3836        for (final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument : receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3837          if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3838            // OK
3839          } else if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3840            final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds = receiverTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3841            switch (bounds.size()) {
3842            case 0:
3843              // OK
3844              break;
3845            case 1:
3846              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3847                return false;
3848              }
3849              break;
3850            default:
3851              return false;
3852            }
3853          } else {
3854            return false;
3855          }
3856        }
3857        return true;
3858      }
3859      return false;
3860    }
3861
3862    @Override
3863    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3864                                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3865      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3866        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3867        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3868        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
3869          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
3870            if (!CdiTypeArgumentSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i), payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i))) {
3871              return false;
3872            }
3873          }
3874          return true;
3875        }
3876      }
3877      return false;
3878    }
3879
3880
3881    /*
3882     * Inner and nested classes.
3883     */
3884
3885
3886    @Experimental
3887    private static class CdiTypeArgumentSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3888
3889      private static final CdiTypeArgumentSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiTypeArgumentSemantics();
3890
3891      private CdiTypeArgumentSemantics() {
3892        super();
3893      }
3894
3895      @Override
3896      protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3897                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3898        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverClass, payloadTypeVariable);
3899      }
3900
3901      @Override
3902      protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3903                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3904        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverParameterizedType, payloadTypeVariable);
3905      }
3906
3907      @Override
3908      protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3909                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3910        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverGenericArrayType, payloadTypeVariable);
3911      }
3912
3913      private final <X, Y> boolean actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverActualType,
3914                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3915        // Section 5.2.4 of the CDI specification is mealy-mouthed but
3916        // interpretable:
3917        //
3918        // "…the required type parameter [receiverActualType] is an
3919        // actual type [never defined, but implied by other sentences
3920        // scattered throughout the specification to be either a
3921        // class, parameterized type or generic array type], the bean
3922        // type parameter is a type variable [payloadTypeVariable] and
3923        // the actual type [receiverActualType] is assignable to the
3924        // upper bound[s], if any [there will always be one], of the
3925        // type variable [payloadTypeVariable], or…"
3926        //
3927        // So perhaps somewhat counterintuitively check all the bounds
3928        // of the *payload* and see if the *receiver* is assignable to
3929        // all of them.
3930        for (final Type<Y> bound : this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds())) {
3931          // Note that this is somewhat backwards to what you may expect.
3932          if (!CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound, receiverActualType)) {
3933            return false;
3934          }
3935        }
3936        return true;
3937      }
3938
3939      @Override
3940      protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
3941                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3942        // Section 5.2.4 again:
3943        //
3944        // "…the required type parameter and the bean type parameter are
3945        // both type variables and the upper bound of the required [receiver]
3946        // type parameter is assignable to the upper bound, if any, of
3947        // the bean [payload] type parameter."
3948        //
3949        // The first of many problems with this:
3950        //
3951        // This is of course ambiguous.  See
3952        // https://issues.redhat.com/browse/CDI-440 which was
3953        // unceremoniously closed for no good reason.
3954        //
3955        // "For example, the bullet
3956        //
3957        // * the required type parameter and the bean type parameter
3958        //   are both type variables and the upper bound of the
3959        //   required type parameter is assignable to the upper bound,
3960        //   if any, of the bean type parameter.
3961        //
3962        // should have meaning similar to:
3963        //
3964        // for each upper bound T of the bean type parameter, there is
3965        // an (at least one) upper bound of the required type which is
3966        // assignable to T."
3967        //
3968        // This is not normal Java/covariant semantics.  In Java, if
3969        // you have two type variables, A extends Object and B extends
3970        // Object, you cannot assign B to A or vice versa.  Here, the
3971        // CDI specification is essentially performing a kind of type
3972        // erasure in this one case.
3973        //
3974        // In CDI, when a type variable is a type argument (by
3975        // definition of a parameterized type), the platform basically
3976        // erases it.  In CDI you cannot have a type-variable-typed
3977        // injection point, because of course you can't predict what
3978        // "value" that injection point's type will have at
3979        // application analysis time.  So it stands to reason that if
3980        // there is a type variable "anywhere in" the injection point
3981        // (as a type argument, say) it will effectively be erased to
3982        // its bounds.
3983        return this.match(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds(), receiverTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3984      }
3985
3986      @Override
3987      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3988                                                                       final boolean lowerBounded,
3989                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3990        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadClass);
3991      }
3992
3993      @Override
3994      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3995                                                                                   final boolean lowerBounded,
3996                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3997        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadParameterizedType);
3998      }
3999
4000      @Override
4001      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
4002                                                                                  final boolean lowerBounded,
4003                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
4004        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadGenericArrayType);
4005      }
4006
4007      private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
4008                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
4009                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadActualType) {
4010        return
4011          (!lowerBounded || this.match(payloadActualType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds())) &&
4012          this.match(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds(), payloadActualType);
4013      }
4014
4015      @Override
4016      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
4017                                                                              final boolean lowerBounded,
4018                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
4019        final List<? extends Type<Y>> condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds = this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds());
4020        if (!lowerBounded || this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds(), true)) {
4021          final List<? extends Type<X>> condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds = this.condense(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds());
4022          return
4023            this.match(condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false, condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false) ||
4024            this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false);
4025        }
4026        return false;
4027      }
4028
4029      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
4030        return this.match(bound0, bounds1, true);
4031      }
4032
4033      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1, final boolean condense1) {
4034        if (!bounds1.isEmpty()) {
4035          if (condense1) {
4036            bounds1 = this.condense(bounds1);
4037          }
4038          boolean match = false;
4039          for (final Type<?> bound1 : bounds1) {
4040            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
4041              match = true;
4042              break;
4043            }
4044          }
4045          if (!match) {
4046            return false;
4047          }
4048        }
4049        return true;
4050      }
4051
4052      private final <X> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final Type<?> bound1) {
4053        return this.match(bounds0, true, bound1);
4054      }
4055
4056      private final <X> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final boolean condense0, final Type<?> bound1) {
4057        if (!bounds0.isEmpty()) {
4058          if (condense0) {
4059            bounds0 = this.condense(bounds0);
4060          }
4061          boolean match = false;
4062          for (final Type<X> bound0 : bounds0) {
4063            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
4064              match = true;
4065              break;
4066            }
4067          }
4068          if (!match) {
4069            return false;
4070          }
4071        }
4072        return true;
4073      }
4074
4075      private final <X, Y> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
4076        return this.match(bounds0, true, bounds1, true);
4077      }
4078
4079      private final <X, Y> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0,
4080                                         final boolean condense0,
4081                                         List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1,
4082                                         final boolean condense1) {
4083        if (!bounds0.isEmpty() && !bounds1.isEmpty()) {
4084          for (final Type<X> bound0 : condense0 ? this.condense(bounds0) : bounds0) {
4085            boolean match = false;
4086            for (final Type<Y> bound1 : condense1 ? this.condense(bounds1) : bounds1) {
4087              if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
4088                match = true;
4089                break;
4090              }
4091            }
4092            if (!match) {
4093              return false;
4094            }
4095          }
4096        }
4097        return true;
4098      }
4099
4100    }
4101  }
4102}
